backend/main.mo: Defines an actor exposing product data and query functions to fetch all products or a product by ID.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping dark‑mode and image‑usage requirements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for key frontend files including hooks, components, styling, and config.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark mode, applying dark theme when class is active.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode by default and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app composing hero, benefits, product cards, and product details with dark‑mode‑friendly assets and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card displaying an image, key details, benefits badges, and a learn‑more button with dark‑mode styling.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailsSe: Full product detail section with large image, benefits, and a how‑to‑use accordion, styled for dark mode.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation with logo and buttons that scroll to product sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend canister actor, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch product lists and individual products through an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a light/dark theme using OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, radii, shadows, and animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, current features, requirements, and thematic/visual constraints for the SW Professional app.
